tab1.title1: Welcome to [ZA] Working Class Hero 10x Server
tab1.text1:
Please join our Discord community for a full list of rules (Link below)

PvP Times 19:00 Friday - 17:00 Sunday (South African Time)

tab4.text1:
No hacking or abusing any game mod or plugin bugs
One character per player per cluster
No aggressive dinosaurs or structures at player spawns and obelisks
No duplicating, exploiting, or cheating
No teaming to attack or defend a tribe at the same time
Spawn zone camping players or tp zones are forbidden
No racism or verbal bullying including any slang variants
tab4.text2:
Two bases per tribe per map
No excessive spam outside of your base
No open-world structures that are not related to your base
No building in glitched areas where you have to do a bug to get in
No floating bases or floating turret towers
NO meshed structures or turrets
tab4.text4:
Fobs must be cleared if inactive
NO meshed structures or turrets
Platform dinos may not be fully concealed on all sides
No placing structures on top of your or another's player model making them invulnerable
Placing turrets in open-world PVP is allowed but must be picked up afterward
